original_title: Insurance Association of Sri Lanka ‘Sing Along’
original_body_lines: Reflecting the commitment to foster community spirit within the insurance sector, the Insurance Association of Sri Lanka (IASL) organised the ‘Sing Along with Chandimal’ event at the Grand Monarch Hotel on 2 December. Featuring performances by Chooti Malli, Podi Malli, Judy and Chandimal, the evening brought professionals together, transcending their busy schedules for a night of harmonious celebrations and recreational bliss.
